channel.title: Game on Tanner's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Game on Tanner's Blog

item.title: Development of a 2D Game Called: Snow Fort Defense
item.description: ✨Hello! In this blog post I’m going to be talking about my experience making a game called snow fort defense. ✨ Beginning I started this project at the start of the summer in 2023. This was a project I had the idea for quite some time but hadn’t had the time to do because of school. My plan was simple: create a video game during the 10 weeks of summer. In my mind at the time I thought this was plenty of time to create a full game and I was ready.
